sentences.en: ...a black leather jacket.
sentences.cn: …一件黑色皮夹克。

sentences.en: a suede jacket
sentences.cn: 绒面革夹克

sentences.en: Gene has to wear a jacket and tie to work.
sentences.cn: 吉恩上班得穿西装打领带。

sentences.en: He bought a sports jacket on sale at Gowings Men's Store.
sentences.cn: 他在高英斯男装店买了一件打折的运动上衣。

sentences.en: He never washed, and always wore a filthy old jacket.
sentences.cn: 他总是穿着一件从来不洗的脏兮兮的旧夹克。

sentences.en: He pulled the zip of his leather jacket down slightly.
sentences.cn: 他稍稍往下拉了拉皮夹克的拉链。

sentences.en: He unzipped his jacket.
sentences.cn: 他拉开夹克衫的拉链。

sentences.en: He wore a black band on the left sleeve of his jacket.
sentences.cn: 他在夹克衫的左袖上戴了一条黑箍儿。

sentences.en: His work jacket hung on the peg in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 他的工作服挂在厨房里的挂钩上。

sentences.en: I found his jacket, which was hanging up in the hallway.
sentences.cn: 我找到了他那件夹克衫，就在门厅里挂着。

sentences.en: I glanced down at my dress jacket a little self-consciously.
sentences.cn: 我不好意思地低头扫了一眼自己的连衣裙外套。

sentences.en: I was wearing two sweaters under the green army jacket.
sentences.cn: 我在绿军装里套了两件毛线衫。

sentences.en: Jason had taken off his jacket and loosened his tie.
sentences.cn: 贾森已经脱下夹克，松开了领带。

sentences.en: She rested her cheek against the roughness of his jacket.
sentences.cn: 她把脸颊靠在他粗糙的夹克上。

sentences.en: She was trying on an $8,000 jacket for size.
sentences.cn: 她正在试穿一件价值8,000美元的短外套。

sentences.en: The bitter wind cut through his jacket.
sentences.cn: 刺骨的冷风吹透了他的夹克衫。

sentences.en: The branches tore at my jacket and scratched my hands and face.
sentences.cn: 树枝刮破了我的夹克，划伤了我的手和脸。

sentences.en: The middle button of his uniform jacket was strained over his belly.
sentences.cn: 制服上装中间的纽扣在他的肚子上绷得紧紧的。

sentences.en: The tweed jacket she wore had seen better days.
sentences.cn: 她穿的那件粗花呢夹克已经很旧了。

sentences.en: When I grew out of my jacket,I gave it to my little brother.
sentences.cn: 我长得穿不下我的夹克衫了，便把它给我弟弟穿。

sentences.en: Will you lend me your jacket for a little while?
sentences.cn: 你能把上衣借给我穿一会儿吗？

phrases.tran_cn: 晚礼服；无尾礼服；小礼服；礼服夹克（等于tuxedo）
羽绒服；鸭绒衣；羽绒夹克
猎装；便装上衣；（男子在非正式场合穿的）粗花呢西装外套

trans.tran_cn: 短上衣，夹克，土豆皮，书籍的护封，文件套，公文夹
给…穿夹克；给…装护套；给…包上护封；〈口〉打
